about.title: About Us
about.description: Founded in 2010 in Burdur, DuruGenetik brings world-class livestock genetics and hands-on support to farms across the region.

services.title: Our Services
services.intro: Our veterinary team manages planning, sourcing, and on-site support under one roof to keep every herd on target.

list.title: Genetic Planning
list.description: We translate herd data into tailored mating maps that protect your goals.

list.description: High-performing female lines accelerate replacements without disruption.

list.title: Advanced Transfer Programs
list.description: Coordinated donor and recipient schedules push pregnancy rates higher.

list.title: Lifecycle Field Support
list.description: Routine visits align nutrition, health, and records all season long.

approach.title: How We Deliver
approach.description: A clear workflow keeps every engagement measurable and aligned with your targets.

steps.desc: We audit herd data, facilities, and goals.
